3: I... I'm sorry for my behavior just now...
I don't know why, but when I saw this plushie, a strange yet familiar feeling welled up within me...
When I found out it was gone, I couldn't help but feel immense sadness...
A voice spoke to me, telling me to never let go of it...
No worries. Everyone has their own priorities. That's why we're here.
If you're lost, then simply walk forward.
Walking forward itself can be meaningful enough.
